scripts.copy-assets: npm run copy-bootstrap && npm run copy-boxicons && npm run copy-perfect-scrollbar && npm run copy-apexcharts
scripts.copy-bootstrap: mkdir -p public/vendor/libs/bootstrap/js && mkdir -p public/vendor/libs/bootstrap/css && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js public/vendor/libs/bootstrap/js/ && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css public/vendor/libs/bootstrap/css/
scripts.copy-perfect-scrollbar: mkdir -p public/vendor/libs/perfect-scrollbar && cp -r node_modules/perfect-scrollbar/dist/perfect-scrollbar.min.js public/vendor/libs/perfect-scrollbar/ && cp -r node_modules/perfect-scrollbar/css/perfect-scrollbar.css public/vendor/libs/perfect-scrollbar/
